title: Whats this about then?
body:
I know these Chinese new years skins are not coming out this patch, but how come they weren't announced in the patch notes?

regardless of when they come out, they should be mentioned in the patch notes saying they have been implemented into the game but will not be made available until (insert date here), otherwise it just causes major confusion.

Also on a separate note, why the delay? we have been waiting since december 9th for these skins, (at least 5 weeks) please don't make us wait at least another 2 (but will almost certainly be 4) more weeks.....

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LK32uVOx,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-16T02:14:40.681+0000)
>
> I know these Chinese new years skins are not coming out this patch, but how come they weren't announced in the patch notes?
> 

The assests probably weren't even included in the patch and only the splash may have been patched in. Why mention they're in the patch but not coming out for another 2 weeks (patch cycle is generally around 2 weeks)


> Also on a separate note, why the delay? we have been waiting since december 9th for these skins, (at least 5 weeks) please don't make us wait at least another 2 (but will almost certainly be 4) more weeks.....

Because Chinese New Year isn't until February 8 so why release skins for an event 3 weeks in advance?

the xmas skins came out on the 9th of december and xmas isn't till the 25th?
why should this be any different?

Because the event is Snowdown and it started on the 10th of December until the 8th of January. It was a full event that included a gamemode, multiple sales, gifting promos and went for a month. The skins here are for the Lunar Revel (Lunar New Year) and will be released closer to the date.

Patch 5.24 was also the last patch of the year so Riot wouldn't have been able to release the skins in a patch closer to Christmas.

Just because its the last patch doesn't mean they had to release all the content when they did, they could easily have released skins later on in the patch. 

The harrowing skins for the past 3 years haven't come out on the dot of halloween either, (and only in one of those years was there a game-mode) 

The Nidalee skin that celebrates the beginning of the season came out now when the season doesn't start for another week or so.

in any case, my point was that these skins will have a gap of 9 weeks from announcement to release, unlike the usual 2 week gap of most other skins. So we are waiting longer for these skins than other skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LK32uVOx,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-16T07:16:06.847+0000)
>
> 
> in any case, my point was that these skins will have a gap of 9 weeks from announcement to release, unlike the usual 2 week gap of most other skins. So we are waiting longer for these skins than other skins.

Where's the announcement for these skins? They've been put up on the PBE for testing and that's it. Unless I've missed the announcement, then nothing is official.
I suppose the PBE isn't an official riot client then

I would bet that less than 1% of the player base actually checks what's on the PBE. It's not one of Riot's official communication channels. They don't announce what they put on the PBE and the only reason people are aware of what is exactly put into the PBE is sites like Surrender @ 20. 

Things have been put on the PBE and later taken off and not released. Putting something on the PBE is not Riots way of announcing something, there will always be a separate post for when skins/champs/etc. are about to hit live.

There are only two ways that the knowledge of upcoming content reaches the community.

1. leaks

2. Official chanels 

if something is put on the PBE, its not counted as a leak is it? therefore it is an official channel, wether they have a separate announcement is irrelevant, once something is put up on the PBE, riot has announced their intention to implement it into the game, wether it reaches the live servers or not.

you cant exactly call sites like Skinspotlights leaks can you?

there doesn't have to be an announcement for things to be official.
as for what you said before and i quote:

_"Where's the announcement for these skins? They've been put up on the PBE for testing and that's it. Unless I've missed the announcement, then nothing is official."_

There still hasn't been an announcement for these skins, yet they are in the live client at the moment, if you get a battle boost on aram it is actually possible to play as them.

yet there has been no 'official announcement' so are you saying that they still aren't official?
yes or no?
